attributes.additional_details:
In Britain we have Monkey and Ape rescue centres that care for primates that have been rescued from places they can not or was not being cared for correctly often with high phycological problems.

We feel it is wronge for these rescue centres to then place these primates on public display. And operate a money making buisness around it .

We ask the goverment to make it law the "Rescue Centres" are not allowed to place these animals on public display making profits and running it as a profit making buisness
